column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with our Tastes of Chicago division. If you're open to it
column2: our management team would love to speak with you about this more directly. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
